The undercover videos bear similarities to those that united lawmakers in opposition to low-income advocacy group ACORN. . In March, when the New York Times reported on the fracturing relationship between Apple and Google, Steve Jobs declined to comment. Eric Schmidt , meanwhile, was anything but cold, calculating, and distant. I continue to believe, as many do, that Steve Jobs is the best CEO in the world today, and I admire Apple and Steve Jobs enormously, Eric Schmidt declared. Is Schmidt-and, by extension, Google-tough enough to stay on top in tech? People have been asking this question about Google for years, but rarely has it mattered as much as it does

with Unequal Technologies, a provider of the football pads Michael Vick wore most of this season. "To sum it all up, the last five months, have been delayed gratification," Michael Vick said. Things that I wanted to accomplish the last couple years that I couldn't and I had to wait for it, and I had to be patient, and I did it and it all paid off. I just thank God for putting me with the right group of people, with Andy, with a flagship organization, a great group of coaches.... They give me all the credit, but I give them the credit.
